name: The end is just the begining
name_original: The end is just the begining
description:
Current work in progress.

This game is a small puzzle type game where you have died, and have to find your way to the afterlife without the monsters trapping you and destroying your soul. 

I have many ideas to improve this game, but no motivation right now. Any advice or suggestions would be greatly appreciated. 

Also, the controls may be useful to note. nearly forgot about them- heh.. WASD keys to move, space bar to attack. There is a bug with the monsters, they won't die unless they're facing you when you attack. that may be a bit annoying, but I couldn't figure out how to fix that. sorry..

You get three lives, each death will take you back to the start of the level, the third death should take you back to the first level. There are only three levels.
